description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

No validation required because the row_translation_rule has already validated that a wetland code exists. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.

No validation required because the row_translation_rule has already validated that a wetland code exists. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the second character.

No validation required because the row_translation_rule has already validated that a wetland code exists. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the third character.

No validation required because the row_translation_rule has already validated that a wetland code exists. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the fourth character.
